entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.4°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
